text: Ezɨ Gumazibar Otarim izava dagheba ko wainɨn dɨpaba api. Ezɨ me ghaze, ‘Ia gan, a gumazir puv daghem ko wainɨn dɨpam apim. Egha a dagɨaba isir gumaziba ko gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba, a men roroabagh amua me ko iti.’ Me kamaghɨn mɨgeima, gumazamiziba men gara fo, Godɨn fofozim a guizbangɨra bizim.”
